title: Alpha Sydney Diamond+ LFM Last Call
body:
Alpha Sydney League of Legends is currently under the recruitment phase. This will be the last the last call for any players that are wishing to join our competitive team. Our applicants are all of a high calibre of skill and our end goal for the main team is OPL. We are currently looking for high end Top laners  to fill our roster. The trials will begin**_ 22/09/15 Tuesday 6pm AEST_**. After this recruitment will close as we will have our teams set.  

If you would like to apply for our team please add my ign **ASYD Doss** or reply directly to this thread and I will get back to you with other information. Thank you very much for reading and good luck.

replies.body:
Silver 2 ADC main, stuck in this elo, I should be challenger. I once beat a platinum ADC main so you can tell I'm good.
I main AP Rengar ADC, he's a very lane bullied ADC but once I hit around 40 minutes, I'll one shot Chief Raydere, unless he gets Zhonyas.
My secondary picks for ADC would have to be on hit TF and then Teemo.
Diamond IV Mid Main, you can tell I'm good because I used IV and not 4, unlike the guy below me.

Diamond 5 support, 
Interested in joining hmu in game
